This is kind of a social network that we constructed, so each client in the data set was presented as a node and then edges where the social link between clients.
So then we utilized two approaches to construct this network.
So in the first one we use this weighted directed scheme.
So the weights are assigned as the frequency of communication between 2 users.
But then here we have a problem because even if there is only one communication event between 2 users, we have a link between them.
So this kind of introduces a lot of noise and we might have some social links that not necessarily exist in like real world.
So for that reason we also introduced this unweighted directed network, so then we use this threshold.
